text: Ryan Edward Mackenzie (born August 3, 1982) is an American politician who has been the U.S. representative from Pennsylvania's 7th congressional district since 2025. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was in the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from 2012 to 2024. Mackenzie was elected to represent Pennsylvania's 7th congressional district in 2024 after beating incumbent Susan Wild. ==References== ==Other websites== *Campaign website * *State Representative Ryan Mackenzie: official caucus site *Ryan Mackenzie (R): official PA House site Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:People from Allentown, Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Ryan Mackenzie
